title: 'Softest pillow ever'
body: It's the softer pillow till date used. It restore it's shape soon you get up. It's can be used in many ways as head, back pillow. I specially bought this pillow for my pregnant wife in third trimester, special for supporting baby bump. I purchased solimo pillow covers with it, in combination, so pillow fits well in pillow cover well. They slightly costly in comparison to other brands but their performance, give full satisfaction.
